item.title: Trump Spent the Past Year Trying to Crush Dissent
item.description: The next three years will require a vigilant defense of free speech and open debate.

item.title: New Year’s Eve Forecast Is Very Cold Across the U.S.
item.description: Some of the season’s most frigid temperatures are expected this week.
